Word dictionary builder
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.word_dictionary.build

+------------+---------------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.word_dictionary.build |
+------------+---------------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                                   |
+------------+---------------------------------------+


Inputs
======

+--------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                                                 |
+========+=========================================================================================+
| corpus | :class:`IntegerListsDocumentCorpus <pimlico.datatypes.ints.IntegerListsDocumentCorpus>` |
+--------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| vocab  | :class:`Dictionary <pimlico.datatypes.dictionary.Dictionary>`                           |
+--------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Outputs
=======

+------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| Name       | Type(s)                                              |
+============+======================================================+
| dictionary | :class:`~langsim.datatypes.word_dict.WordDictionary` |
+------------+------------------------------------------------------+

Options
=======

+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
| Name      | Description                                                                  | Type |
+===========+==============================================================================+======+
| threshold | Minimum number of occurrences required of a character to be included         | int  |
+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
| limit     | Limit vocab size to this number of most common entries (after other filters) | int  |
+-----------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
